Key_Features: High Insulation Resistance, Highly Flexible, Long life, Fire resistance
Short_Description: Tinned flexible copper conductor, Crosslinked elastomeric compound insulation, sheath either in a single layer or two layer of crosslinked elastomeric compound 750V cable.
Full_Description: POLYCAB 450/750V H07BN4-F heavy-duty cable insulated and sheathed with cross-linked elastomeric compound. This cable fulfils the requirements as per EN 50525-2-21, cables are intended to use for a variety of applications where appliance or equipment,including heavy industrial equipment, require a flexible connection to the power supply.

Key_Features: Heat resistant, Highly Flexible, Long life
Short_Description: Single core cable, flexible copper conductor, silicon insulated, unsheathed cable
Full_Description: 1100 V Single core cable, flexible copper conductor, silicon insulated, unsheathed cable are designed to use in flexible wiring, single phase or three phase (earthed or unearthed) system for rated voltage up to and including 1100 V. These cables may be used on DC system for rated voltage grade 1500 V to earth. These cables are suitable to use for heater leads, electric iron leads, furnace and high temperature area.
